title: 7 perch land for sale in Athurugiriya - Paradise city (Prime lands project)
details:
The land slot 127 from the prime lands paradise city project (consists of around 250) blocks is for sale.

The land is in rathuwilawaththa road, athurugiriya. accessible through thunadahena road and korathota road.

2.8 km from millennium city housing scheme
